@figment12 wrote:

Hey i want to if this is right

i got to npchanler.java

Add this
} else if (npcs[i].npcType == 57) {
if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) // this is the time delay
{
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn(“figment”)) {
npcs[i].textUpdate = “owner figment is ONLINE”;
} else {
npcs[i].textUpdate = “owner figment is OFFLINE”;
}
}
}

is that code right?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 10, 2010, 09:12:21 pm[/size][hr]if (npcs[i].npcType == 364) {
if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Admin Portal Only!”;
}
}
} else if (npcs[i].npcType == 57) {
if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) // this is the time delay
{
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn(“figment”)) {
npcs[i].textUpdate = “owner figment is ONLINE”;
} else {
npcs[i].textUpdate = “owner figment is OFFLINE”;
}
}
}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 2) {
if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Help me please! Kill the beast!”;
}
}

thats how it would be in there right?
